subject: No updates on the delivery since 1st december
description_text:
Hello,
I've recently ordered a set of pedals and a heelplate (  Order #SSN3959 ).
The heelplate has been sent on 28th november with YunExpress
YT2533200708957954 <http://www.yuntrack.com/Track/Detail/YT2533200708957954>.
Everything was normal until 1st December, when the package arrived to the
airport in China. Since then we had no updates on the delivery status which
is concerning.
Can you please check if u have any additional info about the package
through your view?
If not can you please message them about this situation with asking what is
the current status of the delivery and where the package is?
If lets say the parcel is lost, what is the procedure?

Thanks in advance,
Oskar Tomala

conversations.body_text: Hi Oskar4531,    This is your final leg tracking link. We will expedite the initial shipment for you, please don't worry.  https://gls-group.com/PL/en/parcel-tracking/  tracking number: 54501098572
